rule.name: z_AS_ADT_TST_ParentUpdated
rule.description: Sample parent CDT used for test cases
rule.definition: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_Parent'( parentId: 1, text: "This is the text of parent 1", date: today() + 1, complexChildSingle: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildSingle'( childId: 1, /* Updated */ text: "This is the UPDATED text of complex child single", date: today() + 1 ), complexChildMultiple: { 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildMultiple'( childId: 1, text: "This is the text of complex child multiple 1", date: today() + 1 ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildMultiple'( childId: 2, text: "This is the text of complex child multiple 2", date: today() + 2 ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildMultiple'( childId: 3, text: "This is the text of complex child multiple 3", /* Updated */ date: today() + 33 ), 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_SAMPLE_ComplexChildMultiple'( childId: 4, text: "This is the text of complex child multiple 4", date: today() + 4 ) }, isActive: true )
